entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 22 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023
